item.title: My experience as a Google Summer of Code Contributor - Introduction
item.description: So it begins! With some pushes and pulls from friends, I’ve been studying the Linux Graphical stack for some time now. After some minor patches to both Mesa and the Linux Kernel, I followed the instructions thoroughly and landed a successful Google Summer of Code proposal: Introduce Unit Tests to the AMDGPU “DCE” Component My project’s primary goal is to create unit tests using KUnit for the AMDGPU driver focused on the Display and Compositing Engine (DCE) 11.
